actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to prohibit restrictions on work rules in locations in which there is hunting, fishing, or shooting sports, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Adds a provision to the Occupational Safety and Health Act stating that nothing in the Act shall be construed to authorize any regulation designed to restrict hunting, fishing, or shooting sports or to establish safety or health standards for work performed in any location which is customarily used for those activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to prohibit restrictions on work rules in locations in which there is hunting, fishing, or shooting sports, and for other purposes.
